title: 1dsum
description: Sum or average columns of ASCII files with numbers arranged in rows and columns.

input_files.title: Input files
input_files.description: Input ASCII files with numbers arranged in rows and columns.

ignore_rows.title: Ignore rows
ignore_rows.description: Skip the first nn rows of each file

use_rows.title: Use rows
use_rows.description: Use only mm rows from each file

mean_flag.title: Mean flag
mean_flag.description: Compute the average instead of the sum

nocomment_flag.title: No comment flag
nocomment_flag.description: Do not reproduce comments from the header of the first input file to the output.

okempty_flag.title: OK empty flag
okempty_flag.description: If encountering an empty 1D file, print 0 and exit quietly instead of exiting with an error message.
